snippet: Bahrain told the senior United States official on human rights to end his visit early after he met with the nation’s main Shiite opposition group.
abstract: Bahrain orders Tom Malinowski, senior United States official on human rights, to cut short his visit and leave the country after he meets with al-Wefaq, country's main Shiite opposition group.

byline.original: By MICHAEL R. GORDON and KAREEM FAHIM
byline.contributor: Michael R. Gordon reported from Washington, and Kareem Fahim from Cairo. David D. Kirkpatrick contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Bahrain told the senior United States official on human rights to end his visit early after he met with the nation’s main Shiite opposition group.

headline.main: U.S. Official Ordered Out of Bahrain After Meeting
headline.print_headline: U.S. Official Ordered Out of Bahrain After Meeting

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
